javadoc: Interface for a SettingsDefinition with enumerated values.

methods.name: getChoice
methods.comment: Returns the current value for this settings

methods.name: setChoice
methods.comment: Sets the given value into the settings object using this definition as a key

params.name: settings
params.comment: the settings to store the value.

params.name: value
params.comment: the settings value to be stored.

methods.name: getDisplayChoice
methods.comment: Returns the String for the given enum value

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to get a display string for

params.name: settings
params.comment: the instance settings which may affect the results

return.comment: the display string for the given settings.

methods.name: getDisplayChoices
methods.comment: Gets the list of choices as strings based on the current settings

return.comment:
an array of strings which represent valid choices based on the current
 settings.

name: EnumSettingsDefinition
comment: Interface for a SettingsDefinition with enumerated values.
